name: Doughnuts
author: In Memory of Bert Dumey
instructions: Soften yeast in water. Scald milk and add sugar and salt. Cool to lukewarm, add flour to make a batter. Mix well. Add softened yeast, eggs and nutmeg. Beat well. Add enough flour to make a soft dough. Place in greased bowl and let rise until double in size. Punch down dough. Roll to 1?2 inch thick and cut with doughnut cutter. Place on towel and let rise until double. Fry in hot oil until golden brown. Dip in icing or powdered sugar.
